name: Heavy Blade
description: Heavy Blade is a fast paced 3D hack and slash dungeon crawler with gorgeous visuals and a heavy rock soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or Greater Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible Storage: 220 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 7,8,10 Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core or Greater Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 compatible Storage: 220 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
